front.title: Coordinated Forwarding and Caching in Information-Centric Networks

abstract.t: Content caching plays an important role in Information-Centric Networking (ICN). Many of current ICN designs adopt a limited, en- route hierarchical caching mechanism; additionally, caching and forwarding are largely uncoordinated in these designs. This draft describes a coordinated caching and forwarding design to improve content access cost and cache miss rate of ICN.
